import math

math.sin(0)

0.0
math.sin(math.pi)

1.2246467991473532e-16
"{:.2f}".format(math.sin(math.pi))

'0.00'
"""
shakshuka:        10.99 NIS
break:             7.50 NIS
steak:           125.00 NIS
vat%              17.00%
vat:              15.82 NIS  
total:           142.67 NIS
"""

x = """
shakshuka: {:>10.2f} NIS
break:     {:>10.2f} NIS
steak:     {:>10x} NIS
vat%       {:>10.2f} %
vat:       {:>10.2f} NIS  
total:     {:>10.2f} NIS
""".format(10.99, 7.50, 125, 17, 15.82, 142.67)
print(x)

shakshuka:      10.99 NIS
break:           7.50 NIS
steak:            175 NIS
vat%            17.00 %
vat:            15.82 NIS  
total:         142.67 NIS


"{:X}".format(255)

'FF'
shaksuha = 10.5
bread = 5
steak = 125
vatper = 17
x = f"""
shakshuka: {shaksuha:>10.2f} NIS
bread:     {bread:>10.2f} NIS
steak:     {steak:>10.2f} NIS
vat%:      {vatper:>10.2f} %
vat:       {(shaksuha+bread+steak)*vatper/100:>10.2f} NIS
"""
print(x)

shakshuka:      10.50 NIS
bread:           5.00 NIS
steak:         125.00 NIS
vat%:           17.00 %
vat:            23.89 NIS
